experiences.title: Full Chip Timing & Layout Design intern
experiences.subtitle: Intel
workDescription: Built automation flows for reliability validation at full chip level and used **RedHawk by Ansys** to debug IR violations.
Used **Synopsys Fusion Compiler** to extract layout and timing information for RTL owners using **C++**, **TCL**, and **Python**.
Ran static timing analysis models to debug timing paths using **PrimeTime** on Intel’s next-generation processors.
Collaborated with **RTL** and **Physical Design (PD)** IP owners to resolve **max cap**, **max transition**, **setup**, and **hold** violations.
Developed **shell scripts** to build pre- and post-hooks for automating timing analysis workflows.

experiences.title: Head Machine Learning TA
experiences.subtitle: BYU Electrical Engineering
workDescription: Taught lectures on **Ensemble Methods**, **Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)**, **LSTMs**, and **GRUs** to a class of 30 students.
Graded over **120 research papers** and guided students on topics such as **Decision Trees**, **Neural Networks**, **LSTMs**, and **Kernel Methods**.
Created **tutorial videos** demonstrating coding samples in **Python**, **Keras with JAX**, **Weights & Biases (WANDB)**, and **PyTorch** for model tuning and GPU acceleration.

experiences.title: Standard Cell Design & Machine Learning intern
experiences.subtitle: Intel
workDescription: Designed an automation pipeline for **Monte Carlo (MC) simulations** using **HSpice** and **Python**, increasing efficiency by **50%**.
Debugged design behavior and **SystemVerilog assertions** for clock designs using **Verdi**.
Developed a **custom machine learning architecture** for anomaly detection to enhance the verification methodology for **Standard Cells**.
Gained hands-on experience in **Standard Cell Design and Layout** using **Cadence Virtuoso** with **Intel** and external foundries on **3nm** and **2nm** processes.

experiences.title: Process Optimization intern
experiences.subtitle: Crowe LLP
workDescription: Led an initiative to increase **automated testing by 15%** using **Python** and **Power Automate** for client auditing.
Managed **Linux servers** and large **databases**, executing complex **SQL queries** for data testing and analysis.
